title: Hey Duggee - Cake Badge
cardDescription: The Cake Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 2 and has a cream cake with a cherry on top of it.
description: The Cake Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 2 and has a cream cake with a cherry on top of it.

content.content: Badge is worked as a spiral so no joining rounds until the outer edge.

content: (3 sc, inc, 2 sc) x6, at last sc pull through with SC [42]
slst, (inc with hdc, 6 hdc) x6, last hdc is made into the first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.
If the sides of the cake are not complitely straight or cherry not round enough, you can make corrections when sewing it to the badge.

content: hdc to 3rd ch from the hook, 8 hdc, turn [9]
yellow ch, 2 sc, white sc, yellow 2 sc, white sc, yellow sc, white, sc, yellow sc, turn [9]
white ch, 2 sc, yellow sc, white 2 sc, yellow sc, white 3 sc, turn [9]
attach red to 4th sc of previous row, ch, 2 sc, turn [2]

content.content: Sew in place and hide the yarn ends.
